resources.string:
"
Khublei
 A Khasi word which means to Greet.
 It also means Thank You.
 The word is said to be derived from two words
 Kyrkhu and Blei which when translated to English means God Bless.
 "

"
This is a simple greeting card maker app. The Cards generated with this app are saved in your Download folder with filename starting with 'Khublei_image'
This is an ad-free and open source app build as a group project by the students taking Android Development Course, in 2019 with the guidance of 

Mr. Kitborlang L. Kynshi 

and "

"Special Thanks to 
St. Anthony's College, Shillong
Meghalaya Developers Community
Sngur
and Baianeh Nongkhlaw for the images.
"

"Support us with either a one time donation or a monthly donation and help us continue our activities.
Funds will go towards developers to work on awesome features for you!
We will also display any message you want in our website.
 To support us, get in touch by sending us an email.
email: sngurshillong@gmail.com"
